citations.narrative:
There were 18 sales of puppies between May and September 2024 that were not documented using APHIS Form 7006
Record of Disposition of Dogs and Cats. The sales were documented in writing in another format.
Failure to utilize required APHIS forms which fully and correctly disclose the number of animals disposed of can result in
not having complete and accurate information to track animals being used in regulated activities to ensure their humane
care and use.
The licensee shall make, keep, and maintain records of disposition of dogs that fully and correctly discloses the required
information utilizing the Record of Disposition of Dogs and Cats (APHIS Form 7006).
Correct by: December 3, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(a)(2) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
There were 18 sales of puppies between May and September 2024 that were not documented using APHIS Form 7006 
Record of Disposition of Dogs and Cats. The sales were documented in writing in another format. 
Failure to utilize required APHIS forms which fully and correctly disclose the number of animals disposed of can result in 
not having complete and accurate information to track animals being used in regulated activities to ensure their humane 
care and use.  
The licensee shall make, keep, and maintain records of disposition of dogs that fully and correctly discloses the required 
information utilizing the Record of Disposition of Dogs and Cats (APHIS Form 7006). 
Correct by: December 3, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
